[‚Üê Back to commands index](./)

Buy or sell items from the Tzhaar shops.

## /tokkulshop buy

**Usage**

- `/tokkulshop buy name:<string> quantity:<integer>`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `name` | `string` | Yes | The item you want to purchase. | - |
| `quantity` | `integer` | Yes | The quantity you want to purchase. | - |

## /tokkulshop sell

**Usage**

- `/tokkulshop sell name:<string> quantity:<integer>`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `name` | `string` | Yes | The item you want to sell. | - |
| `quantity` | `integer` | Yes | The quantity you want to sell. | - |

**Examples**

- `/tokkulshop buy Obsidian platebody`
- `/tokkulshop sell Chaos rune 5000`
